product_name: Outdoor Research Switchback Cap - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Outdoor Research Switchback Cap offers UPF 30 sun protection, a wicking headband, and a hidden pocket to stash a key while on a sunny hike, paddle or trail run. Check out the unique folding brim. Breathable, lightweight nylon ball cap is your Jill-of-all-trades for outdoor activities. Handy folding brim lets you stow the hat in your jacket pocket or pack. Headband wicks moisture to keep you cool on hot days. Hidden zippered pocket on the side of the crown lets you secure a key, cash or your earrings. Quick-release buckle lets you secure the cap under a ponytail or to a belt loop or pack loop. Outdoor Research Switchback Cap features sewn eyelets that aid ventilation. Closeout.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Switchback Cap offers UPF 30 sun protection, a wicking headband, and a hidden pocket to stash a key while on a sunny hike, paddle or trail run. Check out the unique folding brim.
